pr_title: DPC-445 check provider in provenence header and group match

timeline.message: check provider in provenence header and group match
add test when provenance practitioner doesn't match group practitioner

timeline.bodyText: Should we set a status code on these two exceptions so it doesn't use the default of 500? My initial thought was 401 Unauthorized, but maybe 422 Unprocessable Entity is more accurate because it's the attestation that's a problem, not their authentication. 🤔
timeline.author: em1

replies.bodyText: I would think 422 would be most appropriate, remember this should require a swagger annotation indicating 422 as a potential API response....
replies.author: richbraman

timeline.bodyText: It looks like we've established a pattern of using constants for response codes, either from Response.Status or HttpStatus, so it may make sense to do that here (e.g., HttpStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY_422).
timeline.author: em1
